title: The Meson Model on the Basis of the String Solution of the Heisenberg Equation
abstract: The axially symmetric non-local solution in the Heisenberg equation is found. It is regular in the whole space and has the finite energy on the unit of length according to this we may consider the solution as a string. Taking the non-local spherically symmetric solution, which was found by Finkelstein et. al., and our solution in account we suggest to consider the Heisenberg equation as a quantum equation for non-local objects (strings, flux tubes, membranes and so on). The received solution is used for the obtaining the meson model as a rotating string with the quark on its ends.
